com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl.audio

Class Mini2DxOpenALMusic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl.audio.Mini2DxOpenALMusic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mini2DxMp3.Music, Mini2DxOgg.Music, Mini2DxWav.Music

    public abstract class Mini2DxOpenALMusic
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music
    Modified version of OpenALMusic to support sound completion events

      • read

        public abstract int read(byte[] buffer)
        Fills as much of the buffer as possible and returns the number of bytes filled. Returns <= 0 to indicate the end of the stream.

      • reset

        public abstract void reset()
        Resets the stream to the beginning.

      • loop

        protected void loop()
        By default, does just the same as reset(). Used to add special behaviour in Ogg.Music.
